mapper.insert: insert into account_expectation (AppSheetSerialNo, ReturnCode, ErrorDetail, Status, TransactionCfmDate, TASerialNO, FromTAFlag, RegionCode, NetNo, Specification) values (#{AppSheetSerialNo}, #{ReturnCode}, #{ErrorDetail}, #{Status}, #{TransactionCfmDate}, #{TASerialNO}, #{FromTAFlag}, #{RegionCode}, #{NetNo}, #{Specification})
mapper.update: update account_expectation set ReturnCode = #{ReturnCode}, ErrorDetail = #{ErrorDetail}, Status = #{Status}, TransactionCfmDate = #{TransactionCfmDate}, TASerialNO = #{TASerialNO}, FromTAFlag = #{FromTAFlag}, RegionCode = #{RegionCode}, NetNo = #{NetNo}, Specification = #{Specification}) where AppSheetSerialNo = #{AppSheetSerialNo}
